name: country-explorer-fullstack
description: Full-stack country explorer application with React frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && rm -rf backend/dist && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf backend/node_modules
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
